synopsis.text: Unbeknownst to the aristocratic students of the esteemed Arnold Academy of Magic, the legendary Iceblade Sorcerer, a war hero and the most powerful sorcerer in the world, has joined their ranks disguised as an ordinary student, Ray White. After years of battling in the Far East War and grappling with his formidable powers, Ray seeks solace in the mundane aspects of a school life he never experienced. As the first non-noble student to attend the academy, Ray faces disdain and scorn from his elite peers. Despite the challenges, Ray's unassuming demeanor and innate kindness draw a diverse group of friends to him, leading them into a whirlwind of schemes and adventures. However, as sinister forces emerge and threaten the very bonds that define his newfound life, Ray may have no choice but to confront his past and unleash his true power to protect what he holds dear.
